111.content:
Avoiding gym class is not something you are not familiar with, in fact, it's almost as if you had to learn how to do it properly after failing the first few times, but then you started to actually succeed more the more you kept doing it. You almost memorized some teachers schedule to avoid trouble easily, and this time it didn't seem different from any other time, but then, just when you thought you were about to once again escape from the gym, the gym teacher comes out of the bathroom, and to your misfortune, he sees you and walks in front of you.

"Where do you think you are going? The gym is the other way!" You paralyze for a second, the teacher caught you off guard and you are not sure how to reply, you try to say whatever comes to your mind. "Uhh... I just... forgot something..." The teacher interrupts you before you finish your thoughts. "There's no time, the class is about to begin, you can worry about that later." The teacher waits for you to turn around and walk towards the gym, it seems like this time you have failed to avoid the class. But at least now you know that you should avoid that bathroom the next time you decide to skip the class.

Without much of a choice, you walk towards the gym with the teacher behind you. Every now and then you look at him to see if he is somehow distracted and take a chance to escape, but sadly, that never happens. Once you arrive at the gym, you see the usual faces around, including Cade Williams. As usual, you try to stay at a safe distance from him, there are some rumors about him being the worst kind of bully there is, and although they are just rumors, you decide to not take any chances. However, it seems like Cade is looking directly at you, this is a little weird, considering he probably never even noticed you around. A lot of other boys raise their hands, but as usual, Cade Williams, who is the A student of gym class, is picked by the teacher as the first one who will show everyone else how it's done, now he just needs an opponent or more likely victim. 113.content:
You still can't believe what just happened. As usual, your science teacher wants you and your class to do a group project for the weekend, what a waste of your free time. Sure, if you end up with a friend, you can finish the project quickly and then hang out for the rest of the day, but the groups are made randomly, and you usually end up with someone you don't talk much. This time, however, luck was definitely not on your side, you ended up with Cade Williams, the tall, muscular jock of your class. To be honest, you were always a little intimidated by Cade, so you barely exchanged words until this day. You assumed that Cade wouldn't be interested and would leave all the work to you, that's the worst kind of partner you can have in a group project. But, surprisingly, Cade seemed a little enthusiastic about it, he even proposed to meet at his house. You can't help but feel there's something fishy, but maybe you are just prejudging and Cade will actually prove to be more useful than you think. You are supposed to meet at his house today and finish the project.

You follow Cade's instructions and find a house with Cade's description: "A big, white house with a pinkish-red roof." Yeah, this has to be it. You are still a little nervous about it, you never actually spoke to Cade before, and things are a little awkward, maybe you'll finish the project early and you'll be able to get this over with. You press the button you assume is the one that rings the bell, shortly after, Cade opens the door and greets you, you say hi in return. You notice Cade's clothing, for some reason they pop out of the scene for you, maybe because that's not what he usually wears for school, he is currently using a white tank top and gray sweatpants. You step inside, and your vision is flooded by perfectly painted walls, painting everywhere, even some extravagant decorations. It seems like Cade's family is really wealthy. "Come with me, let's go to my room and get started." You nod and follow Cade up the stairs, you see a bedroom and you wrongly assume that's Cade's when you walk past it, you remember you heard somewhere Cade had an older brother. You are not sure what his name is, but you heard that he is just exactly like Cade: Tall, Heavy and muscular.

You reach his room a few steps after you pass the other door, Cade signals you to get inside, indicating you this is, indeed, his bedroom. You walk, compared to the rest of the house, his room seems a little empty, a single bed, a small tv, a drawer full of clothes and a night table beside the bed. It still looks pretty enough though. You notice Cade closes and locks the room behind you as he steps in, probably so that no one would bother you two while working. "So, where should we start?" You ask as you turn around to look at Cade. But your expectations of seeing Cade standing and answering your questions are broken when you see him charging towards you. You couldn't react in time and Cade tackled you down. You land on with your back on Cade's bedroom gray carpet, that somehow makes your fall hurts a little less. You hit your head and are dazed for a second, enough time for Cade to position himself in the weirdest and gross position you could imagine, he has his butt a few inches away from your face. And the worst thing, your nose is positioned between Cade's big and muscular buttcheeks, you try not to breathe in for the moment, but sooner or later you will have to. Your eyes water and your nose burns, soon, you seem to remember you have arms and legs, you start to flail them in an unsuccessful attempt to break free. info.description:
He's the stuff of nightmares. 6 foot 6 inches and 320 pounds of alpha-male bulk and nastiness. Cade Williams is a sadist among other things, taking great pleasure in tormenting others with his size, smell and brutality.

This is a story focused on kinks such as farting, scat, watersports, humiliation, degradation, raceplay, general musk, and more. Things that are NOT accepted: shrinking/growing, vore, transformation, hypnotism, consensual, chapters with little detail, poor writing.
